price: यदि तू सच्चों में से है, तो हमारे पास फ़रिश्तों को क्यों नहीं ले आता?
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
